long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allow ClearMash users to add tags and comments on web pages.
Using this extension users can add ad-hoc web pages to their ClearMash environment, discuss on web pages and tag them.
Ad-hoc pages could be technical solutions, marketing information or any other web pages relevant to the knowledge environment.
